sentence: As of today's market close, here are the top 10 names showing unusual option activity on tradeMONSTER's LiveAction data system.
Celsion (CLSN): Option volume 2,125 percent above average.
Investors sold about 20,000 September 2.50 puts for $0.10 to $0.20.
Travelzoo (TZOO): Option volume 1,789 percent above average.
Investors sold the December 50 puts, looking for shares to hold their ground.
Procter & Gamble (PG): Option volume 1,743 percent above average.
Call activity surged as investors looked to reap the quarterly dividend.
News B-shares (NWS): Option volume 1,293 percent above average.
Investors sold the January 12 puts for $0.45 and the January 14 puts for $0.90, looking for shares to hold their ground.
News A-Shares (NWSA): Option volume 1,255 percent above average.
Investors bought the January 16 calls and sold the January 19 calls, looking for upside.
